mapper.delete:
delete from basic_windfarm_config where id in
#{item}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id, a.tenant_id, a.tenant_domain, a.wind_farm, a.pro_code, a.city_code, a.area_code, (select pro_name from sys_province where pro_code=a.pro_code) as proName, (select name from sys_city where code=a.city_code ) as cityName, (select name from sys_area where code=a.area_code ) as areaName, (select org_name from sys_organization where id=a.wind_farm and org_type=1) as wind_farm_title, a.latitude, a.longitude, a.geo_json FROM basic_windfarm_config a where 1=1
and a.tenant_id=#{bean.tenantId}
